channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Jianliao Notification Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Jianliao Notification Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34206|2024-08-03T08:16:17.219Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jianliao%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Jianliao Notification Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to send HTTP POST requests to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-34205|2024-08-03T08:16:17.282Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jianliao%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Jianliao Notification Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers to send HTTP POST requests to an attacker-specified URL.
